title: Could garren mid work ?
body: I know its not very meta I was just wondering what the benefits or or cons would be

replies.body: I actually have played quite a bit of ranked games as Garen mid, And it works really well, I suggest this to anyone.
I remember playing this when I was level 10. Rush hexdrinker gg

garen and darius are great at trolling melee mids (all of them) but against mages the lane is far too short to q someone reliably. Also because you your predictable play style you become easy to gank. other than that, you can deny roaming as garen can push very fast and destroy towers and his roams are pretty brutal. unless you are lane swapping or counterpicking (and even then) you should avoid. but if ur playing blind pick anything works.

I watched as a Garen on my team destroyed an Azir in mid and then continued to carry the rest of our scrub team sooo hard. It was hilarious and impressive at the same time. I think you'd have to play him alot tho, and understand mid matchups really well to. I wouldn't suggest it to anyone, but it can be a good thing.

Benefit: you prove your an asshole.
Con: Most mid laners bend you over cause your melee without a gap close, the ones that can't burst you cause your mid and probably building damage.
